titles.title: Expressing support for "National One Love Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
2/14/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) National One Love Day, and (2) the efforts of thousands of organizations and victims across the United States to increase relationship violence awareness.
Calls for every person to speak to just one individual about what a healthy relationship is and help that individual feel empowered.
